item.title: Testing AWS Lambda and API Gateway
item.description: Recently, I had to fix some bugs in a Python AWS lambda which gets triggered by an API Gateway. I’ve found that the way that Lambdas work makes you want to develop it badly. So I hope you can use these tips when you develop your Lambdas to do it better. I worked on a Python Lambda, so this is what you’ll see in this post. How to test AWS Lambda + API Gateway successfully Whitebox: Cover the logic in regular unit tests Blackbox: Cover the Gateway API Gateway API Stages Writing the tests Choose which tests you want to run using pytest’s -k switch What now How to test AWS Lambda + API Gateway successfully The main thing I found to be useful during the development process of AWS Lambdas that are triggered by a Gateway was testing them automatically, in two ways:
